name: Super Trainers: Monster Island
description:
New adventure Reunion of friends
Choose your favorite monster partner, form and cultivate your own exclusive team, and start a new adventure with your friends!

Varieties of gameplay Full of fun
We have not only PVE and PVP gameplay, but also more funny leisure modes such as treasure hunting, desert adventure and so on, which help you relax.

Thrilling Battle Fight To The End
This game includes the turn-based combat mode, unique formation system, and super combat capabilities, allowing you to easily win. What's more, you can counterattack at critical moments and attack the enemy in one hit!
